title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives in the Eclipse IDE, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost.
OB: The maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost when switching from the Java perspective to the resource perspective, and then back to the Java perspective.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective. 2. Double click the title bar to maximize it. 3. Switch to the resource perspective. 4. Switch back to the Java perspective.
